body_html: We would happy to accept a batch that allows this behavior, but we are unlikely to work on it ourselves, since we either use TFRecords or other data formats internally. It shouldn't be super difficult to do yourself. @saxenasaurabh can probably give you some direction on how to use the existing gzip classes, if you'd be willing to help out.

body: We would happy to accept a batch that allows this behavior, but we are unlikely to work on it ourselves, since we either use TFRecords or other data formats internally. It shouldn't be super difficult to do yourself. @saxenasaurabh can probably give you some direction on how to use the existing gzip classes, if you'd be willing to help out.
